ModMetaData.name: LMC025.深层矿藏识别
ModMetaData.author: Feffelicious, Dingo
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html When using the Ground Penetrating Scanner, mouse over highlighted ore veins to identify their type. 当使用地质扫描仪时，鼠标悬停在高亮显示的矿脉上，可以获取其类型信息。 Mod originally made by Feffelicious, updated by Dingo. 汉化：jxb12306
